snippet: Officials would not give details about the operation against a “senior operative” in the Qaeda-linked militant network the Shabab.
abstract: American military forces launch operation in Somalia against Qaeda-linked militant network the Shabab.

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: Officials would not give details about the operation against a “senior operative” in the Qaeda-linked militant network the Shabab.

headline.main: U.S. Troops Take Action on Militants in Somalia
